name: Dragon Princess is Hungry
description:
Eva, the half-dragon, half-human princess.
Pfel, the steward, who serves Eva.
They visit a mysterious isolated island infested with monster girls, and Pfel collects food for Eva on the island.
However, there is a secret hidden on the island.
What awaits the two of them is......


This game is an ARPG with the main element of exploration.
(1) Explore the MAP and defeat monsters to collect food for Eva.
(2) Learn skills as a reward from Eva and become stronger.
(3) Defeat the bosses in the map and get the main ingredients.


  • Animated graphics
  • Skills can be strengthened
  • Over 10 different kinds of weapons with different effects
